description: Unique coral colony identifier (format: FE-POC## e.g. FE-POC57)
Position of colony within experimental array (format: Row-Column e.g. 1-1)
Experimental treatment assignment (CAFI = CAFI present; NO CAFI = CAFI removed)
Branch width size category (thin medium wide)
Initial branch width measurement in millimeters
Numeric encoding of coral_id (for statistical software)
Numeric encoding of position (for statistical software)
Numeric encoding of treatment (for statistical software)
Numeric encoding of branch_width (for statistical software)
